name: Wanda
description: Wanda is the crown princess of the fairies. Her mother, the queen, is missing. To find out what's happened, Wanda must travel to the Spirit Plane. To get there she must first travel through the other elemental planes, dangerous places even for a powerful fairy. Wanda wields wands. Equipping her wands and jewelry with elemental jewels will give Wanda the power she needs to survive her quest.
